docs.lead_paragraph: INTERNATIONAL A3-15 Clinton Says Aid Will Rise If Russia Presses Reforms President Clinton, concluding a summit meeting with President Boris N. Yeltsin, signaled that the West would step up its aid to Russia if it pressed ahead with tough economic reforms. His message was intended to encourage Russia to keep to its pro-capitalist course despite the nation's deepening economic crisis. A1
